annotation.spannedText: The best way to prevent hepatitis B is by getting the hepatitis B vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: The best way to prevent hepatitis B is by getting the hepatitis B vaccine

annotation.spannedText: The hepatitis B vaccine is safe and effective and is usually given as 3-4 shots over a six month period

classMention.mentionClass: The hepatitis B vaccine is safe and effective and is usually given as 3-4 shots over a six month period

annotation.spannedText: Most people do not have any problems with it but a vaccine, like any medicine, could cause a serious reaction

classMention.mentionClass: Most people do not have any problems with it but a vaccine, like any medicine, could cause a serious reaction

annotation.spannedText: Hepatitis B is a very safe vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Hepatitis B is a very safe vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Learn more about possible side effects of hepatitis B vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Learn more about possible side effects of hepatitis B vaccine

annotation.spannedText: All children should get their first dose of hepatitis B vaccine at birth and complete the vaccine series by 6-18 months old

classMention.mentionClass: All children should get their first dose of hepatitis B vaccine at birth and complete the vaccine series by 6-18 months old

annotation.spannedText: Learn more about catching up on vaccines in the Who and When section

classMention.mentionClass: Learn more about catching up on vaccines in the Who and When section

annotation.spannedText: Any adult who is at risk for hepatitis B virus infection or who wants to be vaccinated should talk to a health professional about getting the vaccine series

classMention.mentionClass: Any adult who is at risk for hepatitis B virus infection or who wants to be vaccinated should talk to a health professional about getting the vaccine series

annotation.spannedText: Find out if you should be vaccinated before you travel abroad

classMention.mentionClass: Find out if you should be vaccinated before you travel abroad
